title: Yo Ekko is so broken dude
body: He builds full tank and he can literally 1 shot a adc?

replies.body:
Dude your literally turning into that guy who hates on Ekko every now and then xD 

Just joking I feel you bro he's op as fuck. Also as a semi-Ekko main....

CAN SOMONE LINK ME TO A TANK EKKO BUILD GUIDE EVERYONE SAYS ITS OP BUT I CANT FIND IT ANYWHERE ONLINE LIKE WTF

Bruh we had a fed vladmir vs a 4/3 ekko and vladmir died because ekko has so much health and when you thought you're about to fuck him up he just ults back and gets all the health back. His Q also has a stupid slow which is do dumb + I don't know why his spell still damages you even though he is dead like what the fuk.
I have to say, for a champion that does so much damage, and has SO much cc, he is remarkably hard to kill..

Dood. Everything is broken and OP.
Nerf everything.

Caster minion OP as fuck. Rito plz.
